name: HepatitisB
title: Hepatitis B
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of diagnoses for acute or chronic Hepatitis B infections.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of acute or chronic Hepatitis B.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
